pullrequest.title: Fix simplerecover test when reading liklihood tab file from a single instance run

content.raw:
The source branch should be able to change as referenced here: https://bitbucket.org/site/master/issue/8876/change-source-branch-for-existing
However I can confirm for some reason the web interface would not allow it.

These changes look good to me and @hoffman it's ready for your review
content.html:
The source branch should be able to change as referenced here: https://bitbucket.org/site/master/issue/8876/change-source-branch-for-existing However I can confirm for some reason the web interface would not allow it.

These changes look good to me and @hoffman it's ready for your review
